v8:item.v8:content: Short presentation of report distribution. It can be mentioned in email subject or body.
Directory on the FTP server, to which reports are published.

If the check box is selected and you use the FTP connection, the server opens a port and waits for client connection. It is recommended that you enable it if the client cannot receive incoming TCP connection (for example, when incoming connections are blocked by firewall).
Specify the FTP server port in the range between 0 and 65535.
Scheduled reports are generated with the rights of the user responsible for the report distribution.
Email address responses will be sent to.
Archive files to ZIP on delivery
Select this option to automatically distribute reports on schedule.
Save reports on a FTP server.
Save reports to the app's directory.
Save reports to the selected network directory.
Send reports or notifications by email.
Structure of pictures displayed in the email text.
Only the author and the administrator can start report distribution.
Defines how often report distribution will be repeated.
If the option is selected, each recipient will receive personalized reports.
If the check box is selected, you can use text decorations and pictures in the email text.
Defines if the distribution is ready to be sent out.
The ID of a scheduled job that starts this report distribution.
Network directory for delivering reports (for cluster servers running OS Linux).
Network directory for delivering reports (for cluster servers running OS Windows).
If the check box is selected, recipients will not see other email recipients (only themselves).
Mail format that supports text formatting and embedded pictures.
If the check box is selected, reports will be published and only their publication addresses will be specified in emails. If the check box is cleared, the reports will be attached to emails.
File names will contain only Latin letters and digits to ensure compatibility with different operating systems.
(not used) Include date in file name
Select the option to add the distribution date to the file name.
Report that will be generated for distribution.
Send a report even if it does not contain data.

Properties.Name: Settings
Properties.Comment: Custom set-up of data components or value Tables

v8:item.v8:content: User settings, with which the report will be generated
Report that will be generated for distribution.
If "Yes", the user is included in the distribution list. If set to "No", report will not be sent to the user even if user is listed for distribution.
Excluded recipients do not receive reports.
View event log records filtered by the report distribution.
